answers.answer: I have high blood pressure and gestational diabetes they just started watching me weekly at 30 weeks and so far my pregnancy is going good and my baby measures right what it's suppose to

I have gestational high blood pressure and diabetes. My baby went from growing right on track, to becoming much too big too quickly. You'll be closely monitored now, considered high risk, you'll probably have quite a few more appointments and ultrasounds for growth scans. I'm being induced a little after 37 weeks.

question: went to the doctor and they said I had high blood pressure and diabetes they're trying to see if I had it before or just during pregnancy, did any of you guys have the same problem and have a healthy baby?? So they didn't have to do c section
title: High blood pressure &' diabetes
